import React, { useState } from 'react'; const mockJobs = [ { id: 1, title: "Salesforce Developer", experience: "4+ Years", tags: ["LWC", "Apex", "Salesfor.."], location: "India, Remote", type: "Contract" }, { id: 2, title: "Senior Coldfusion Developer", experience: "7+ Years", tags: ["ColdFusi..", "MVC fram..", "SQL"], location: "World Wide, Remote", type: "Contract" }, { id: 3, title: "Software Engineer", experience: "5+ Years", tags: ["SQL", "Azure", "Visual S.."], location: "Worldwide, Remote", type: "Full Time" }, { id: 4, title: "Lead Salesforce Developer", experience: "3+ Years", tags: ["Salesfor..", "Lightnin..", "Apex"], location: "India, Remote", type: "Contract" }, { id: 5, title: "React Native Developer", experience: "4+ Years", tags: ["React Na..", "JavaScri..", "Rest API"], location: "World Wide, Remote", type: "Contract" }, { id: 6, title: "Python Backend Developer", experience: "5+ Years", tags: ["FastAPI", "AWS clou..", "SQS", "AI/ML"], location: "India, Remote", type: "Contract" }, { id: 7, title: "Software Engineer", experience: "3+ Years", tags: ["Blockcha..", "smart co..", "EIPs"], location: "Worldwide, Remote", type: "Full Time" }, { id: 8, title: "Senior Software Engineer - iOS", experience: "4+ Years", tags: ["iOS", "RESTful ..", "UIKit"], location: "India, Remote", type: "Contract" } ]; const techOptions = [ { name: "Python", count: 11 }, { name: "SQL", count: 10 }, { name: "Java", count: 6 }, { name: "Spring Boot", count: 5 }, { name: "Type script", count: 5 } ]; const locationOptions = [ { name: "Worldwide", count: 29 }, { name: "World Wide", count: 24 }, { name: "India", count: 5 }, { name: "world wide", count: 4 }, { name: "worldwide", count: 1 } ]; const allTechOptions = [ { name: "Python", count: 11 }, { name: "Spring Boot", count: 5 }, { name: ".NET", count: 4 }, { name: "JavaScript", count: 4 }, { name: "Node js", count: 3 }, { name: "Azure", count: 3 }, { name: "Snowflake", count: 2 }, { name: "Tableau", count: 2 }, { name: "REST APIs", count: 2 }, { name: "SQL", count: 10 }, { name: "Type script", count: 5 }, { name: "Java Script", count: 4 }, { name: "Angular", count: 3 }, { name: "FrontEnd", count: 3 }, { name: "Full Stack Development", count: 3 }, { name: "POWER BI", count: 2 }, { name: "API", count: 2 }, { name: "LLM", count: 2 }, { name: "Java", count: 6 }, { name: "React", count: 5 }, { name: "Oracle", count: 4 }, { name: "REST", count: 3 }, { name: "Apex", count: 3 }, { name: "C#", count: 2 }, { name: "Multi Threading", count: 2 }, { name: "Azure Cloud", count: 2 }, { name: "Github", count: 2 } ]; function App() { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [dateFilter, setDateFilter] = useState('all'); const [selectedTech, setSelectedTech] = useState([]); const [selectedLocations, setSelectedLocations] = useState([]); const [minExperience, setMinExperience] = useState('0'); const [maxExperience, setMaxExperience] = useState('30'); const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const [techSearch, setTechSearch] = useState(''); const handleTechChange = (tech) => { setSelectedTech(prev => prev.includes(tech) ? prev.filter(t => t !== tech) : [...prev, tech] ); }; const handleLocationChange = (location) => { setSelectedLocations(prev => prev.includes(location) ? prev.filter(l => l !== location) : [...prev, location] ); }; const clearAllFilters = () => { setSelectedTech([]); setSelectedLocations([]); setDateFilter('all'); setMinExperience('0'); setMaxExperience('30'); setTechSearch(''); }; const filteredTechOptions = allTechOptions.filter(tech => tech.name.toLowerCase().includes(techSearch.toLowerCase()) ); const shareJob = (jobTitle) => { if (navigator.share) { navigator.share({ title: jobTitle, text: `Check out this job: ${jobTitle}`, url: window.location.href }); } else { navigator.clipboard.writeText(`${jobTitle} - ${window.location.href}`); alert('Job link copied to clipboard!'); } }; const scrollToTop = () => { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' }); }; return (
